title: folk_tales_The_Cock_and_the_Jewel
text:
source: https://fairytalez.com/the-cock-and-the-jewel/.
nation: greek.
title: The Cock and the Jewel.
text: A Cock, scratching for food for himself and his hens, found a precious stone and exclaimed: “If your owner had found thee, and not I, he would have taken thee up, and have set thee in thy first estate; but I have found thee for no purpose. I would rather have one barleycorn than all the jewels in the world.”.
